name: The North Face Shellista II Waterproof Insulated Shorty Boots - Women's
categories: Shellista II Waterproof Insulated Shorty Boot
description: Hit the wintry streets with style in this warm, waterproof boot. The suede and nylon upper stands up to salt, snow and slush, and the durable rubber shell has a women's-specific mould that's sleek and flattering. Add in a warm faux fur cuff and winter-specific outsole, and you've got a boot that ticks all the boxes for cold commutes and après-ski outings.Suede and recycled nylon upper repels snow and slush.Waterproof construction.200g PrimaLoft® insulation is warm and lightweight.Faux fur cuff seals out drafts.Waterproof rubber shell is moulded for a women's-specific fit.Rubber outsole is optimized for grip in cold weather, with temperature-sensitive lugs.
